title: War on war = Guerre a la guerre
brief_description: The frequency of wars seems to prove that they resolve nothing. Since the beginning of history we know of eight thousand peace treaties and the urge to begin again was always there. Peace will depend on the young in developed countries endeavouring to understand the problems of those in depressed areas.
